bp_text.value: A Net-Zero Carbon footprint is more than a goal, it is a mission. A paperless office environment, the latest in energy efficient, clean technology, removal of single use plastics and the adoption of smart shipping and travel techniques will make Pendeedus a friend to mother earth.
bp_text.processed: A Net-Zero Carbon footprint is more than a goal, it is a mission. A paperless office environment, the latest in energy efficient, clean technology, removal of single use plastics and the adoption of smart shipping and travel techniques will make Pendeedus a friend to mother earth.
